sql-statement.sql: SELECT DISTINCT sm.* FROM sys_user_role u LEFT JOIN sys_roles r ON u.roleID = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu m ON r.id = m.roleID LEFT JOIN sys_menus sm ON m.menuID = sm.id LEFT JOIN sys_menus psm ON sm.parentID = psm.id WHERE sm.`status` = 1 AND u.userID = ? ORDER BY CASE sm.isParent WHEN 1 THEN sm.sort ELSE psm.sort END, CASE sm.isParent WHEN 1 THEN sm.id ELSE sm.parentID END, sm.isParent DESC, sm.sort
